languages.text: Долго по Простору ходили слухи о жестокости, с которой навигаторский Дом Орселлио отсекал свои родовые ветви и подавлял внутреннюю распрю. Когда страсти утихли, на престол новатора взошла юная Леди-Навигатор Тисифона II Орселлио, властвующая твердо. Много лет спустя имя Орселлио вновь прогремело, когда Тисифона II и ее безумные последователи объявили тайную войну одному из навигаторских Домов. Страшные битвы, развернувшиеся в варпе, были сокрыты от глаз обывателей.

For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours of the brutality with which Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When the dust had settled, the young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio assumed the post of Novator and ruled with an iron fist. Many years passed before the Orsellio name once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her crazed followers started a secret war against another Navigator House. Its vicious battles took place in the warp, hidden from any witnesses in realspace.
languages.original_text: Долго по Простору ходили слухи о жестокости, с которой навигаторский Дом Орселлио отсекал свои родовые ветви и подавлял внутреннюю распрю. Когда страсти утихли, на престол новатора взошла юная Леди-Навигатор Тисифона II Орселлио, властвующая твердо. Много лет спустя имя Орселлио вновь прогремело, когда Тисифона II и ее безумные последователи объявили тайную войну одному из навигаторских Домов. Страшные битвы, развернувшиеся в варпе, были сокрыты от глаз обывателей.

traits.locale_text: For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours about the brutality, with which the Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When all was done, a young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio, assumed the position of Novator., who reigned with an iron fist. Many years have passed, before the name Orsellio once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her mad followers declared a secret war on one of the navigator houses. Vicious battles took place in warp, hidden from the eyes of common observers.

Vicious battles took place in warp, hidden from the eyes of common observers.

languages.text: 很长一段时间里，科罗努斯扩区中都流传着奥赛罗家族残忍地灭绝家族分支、镇压内乱的传闻。当一切尘埃落定之后，年轻的女导航者提西福涅二世·奥赛罗继承了大族长之位，以铁腕手段统治着家族。多年以后，提西福涅二世与她疯狂的追随者对另一支导航者家族发起了秘密战争，而奥赛罗家族之名也再次在扩区中回响。那场恶战发生在亚空间之中，真实世界的人们无从知晓。
languages.original_text: For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours of the brutality with which Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When the dust had settled, the young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio assumed the post of Novator and ruled with an iron fist. Many years passed before the Orsellio name once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her crazed followers started a secret war against another Navigator House. Its vicious battles took place in the warp, hidden from any witnesses in realspace.

traits.locale_text: 很长一段时间里，科罗努斯扩区中都流传着奥塞罗家族残忍地灭绝家族分支、镇压内乱的传闻。当一切尘埃落定之后，年轻的女导航者提西福涅二世·奥塞罗继承了大族长之位，以铁腕手段统治着家族。多年以后，提西福涅二世与她疯狂的追随者对另一支导航者家族发起了秘密战争，而奥塞罗家族之名也再次在扩区中回响。那场恶战发生在亚空间之中，真实世界的人们无从知晓。

languages.text: Lange Zeit kursierten in der Ausdehnung Gerüchte über die Brutalität, mit der das Navigatorenhaus Orsellio seine Ableger abtrennte und seine inneren Konflikte niederschlug. Als der Staub sich legte, übernahm die junge Lady Navigator Tisiphone II. Orsellio den Posten der Novatorin und herrschte mit eiserner Faust. Viele Jahre vergingen, ehe der Name Orsellio wieder durch die Ausdehnung hallte, als Tisiphone II. und ihre fanatischen Anhänger einen geheimen Krieg gegen ein anderes Novatorenhaus begannen. Die erbitterten Schlachten fanden im Warp statt, verborgen vor den Augen von Zeugen im Realraum.
languages.original_text: For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours of the brutality with which Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When the dust had settled, the young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio assumed the post of Novator and ruled with an iron fist. Many years passed before the Orsellio name once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her crazed followers started a secret war against another Navigator House. Its vicious battles took place in the warp, hidden from any witnesses in realspace.

traits.locale_text: Lange Zeit kursierten in der Ausdehnung Gerüchte über die Brutalität, mit der das Navigatorenhaus Orsellio seine Ableger abtrennte und seine inneren Konflikte niederschlug. Als der Staub sich legte, übernahm die junge Lady Navigator Tisiphone II. Orsellio den Posten der Novatorin und herrschte mit eiserner Faust. Viele Jahre vergingen, ehe der Name Orsellio wieder durch die Ausdehnung hallte, als Tisiphone II. und ihre fanatischen Anhänger einen geheimen Krieg gegen ein anderes Novatorenhaus begannen. Die erbitterten Schlachten fanden im Warp statt, verborgen vor den Augen von Zeugen im Realraum.

languages.text: Pendant de longues années, de nombreuses rumeurs circulèrent dans les Étendues, relatant la brutalité avec laquelle la maison de navigateurs Orsellio avait mis fin à sa querelle interne en procédant à l'éviction d'une partie de ses membres. Quand la situation se calma, la jeune navigatrice Tisiphone II Orsellio monta sur le trône de Novator d'où elle gouverna d'une main de fer. De nombreuses années passèrent sans que l'on entendît parler de la maison Orsellio, mais son nom résonna de nouveau dans les Étendues quand Tisiphone II et ses adeptes fanatiques déclarèrent la guerre à une autre maison de navigateurs. Il n'y eut aucun témoin des âpres combats dans l'espace réel, car toutes les batailles se déroulèrent dans le Warp.
languages.original_text: For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours of the brutality with which Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When the dust had settled, the young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio assumed the post of Novator and ruled with an iron fist. Many years passed before the Orsellio name once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her crazed followers started a secret war against another Navigator House. Its vicious battles took place in the warp, hidden from any witnesses in realspace.

traits.locale_text: Pendant de longues années, de nombreuses rumeurs circulèrent dans les Étendues, relatant la brutalité avec laquelle la maison de navigateurs Orsellio avait mis fin à sa querelle interne en procédant à l'éviction d'une partie de ses membres. Quand la situation se calma, la jeune navigatrice Tisiphone II Orsellio monta sur le trône de Novator d'où elle gouverna d'une main de fer. De nombreuses années passèrent sans que l'on entendît parler de la maison Orsellio, mais son nom résonna de nouveau dans les Étendues quand Tisiphone II et ses adeptes fanatiques déclarèrent la guerre à une autre maison de navigateurs. languages.text: Durante mucho tiempo, la Extensión estuvo llena de rumores sobre la brutalidad con la que la casa de Navegantes Orsellio cortó sus ramas y puso fin a sus conflictos internos. Cuando todo acabó, la joven Lady Navegante Tisiphone II Orsellio subió al trono de Novator y gobernó con mano de hierro. Pasaron muchos años hasta que el nombre Orsellio volvió a recorrer la Extensión, cuando Tisiphone II y sus seguidores enloquecidos comenzaron una guerra secreta contra otra casa de Navegantes. Sus batallas encarnizadas tuvieron lugar en la disformidad, invisibles para los habitantes del espacio real.
languages.original_text: For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours of the brutality with which Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When the dust had settled, the young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio assumed the post of Novator and ruled with an iron fist. Many years passed before the Orsellio name once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her crazed followers started a secret war against another Navigator House. Its vicious battles took place in the warp, hidden from any witnesses in realspace.

languages.text: 長い間、エクスパンスではしきりに残酷な噂がささやかれていた。航宙士のオーセリオ家が分家を切り離し、内紛を抑えているというのだ。ほとぼりが冷めたころ、オーセリオ家では若きレディであり航宙士であったティシフォン2世がノベイターとなり、鉄拳による支配を敷いた。そして幾年の時が過ぎ、エクスパンスにふたたびオーセリオの名が響き渡ることになる。ティシフォン2世とその狂信者たちが、他の航宙士一族に密かに戦争を仕掛けたのだ。この邪悪な戦いは歪みで起きたため、リアルスペースからは目が届かなかったという。
languages.original_text: For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours of the brutality with which Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When the dust had settled, the young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio assumed the post of Novator and ruled with an iron fist. Many years passed before the Orsellio name once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her crazed followers started a secret war against another Navigator House. Its vicious battles took place in the warp, hidden from any witnesses in realspace.

traits.locale_text: 長い間、エクスパンスではしきりに残酷な噂がささやかれていた。航宙士のオーセリオ家が分家を切り離し、内紛を抑えているというのだ。ほとぼりが冷めたころ、オーセリオ家では若きレディであり航宙士であったティシフォン2世がノベイターとなり、鉄拳による支配を敷いた。そして幾年の時が過ぎ、エクスパンスにふたたびオーセリオの名が響き渡ることになる。ティシフォン2世とその狂信者たちが、他の航宙士一族に密かに戦争を仕掛けたのだ。この邪悪な戦いは歪みで起きたため、リアルスペースからは目が届かなかったという。

languages.text: Enginlik, Rotacı Orsellio Hanesi'nin dallarını budamak ve iç çekişmelerini bastırmak için başvurduğu gaddarlığa dair söylentilerle uzunca bir süre çalkalandı. Ortalık yatıştıktan sonra genç Leydi Rotacı II. Tisiphone Orsellio, Rota Reisliği makamına erişti ve son derece katı bir yönetim sergiledi. Orsellio ismi, II. Tisiphone ve delirmiş takipçilerinin bir başka Rotacı Hanesi'ne gizli bir savaş ilan etmesine dek Enginlik'te yıllarca duyulmadı. Bu vahşi savaş; gerçekuzaydan kimsecikler şahit olmadan, öteboyutta yapıldı.
languages.original_text: For a long time, the Expanse was filled with rumours of the brutality with which Navigator House Orsellio severed its branches and suppressed its inner strife. When the dust had settled, the young Lady Navigator Tisiphone II Orsellio assumed the post of Novator and ruled with an iron fist. Many years passed before the Orsellio name once again resounded through the Expanse, when Tisiphone II and her crazed followers started a secret war against another Navigator House. Its vicious battles took place in the warp, hidden from any witnesses in realspace.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik uzunca bir süre boyunca, Rotacı Hanesi Orsellio'nun, dallarını budamak ve iç çekişmelerini bastırmak için başvurduğu gaddarlığa dair söylentilerle çalkalandı. Ortalık yatıştıktan sonra genç Leydi Rotacı Tisiphone II Orsellio, Rota Reisi mevkisine yerleşti ve son derece katı bir yönetim sergiledi. Orsellio ismi Enginlik'te yıllar boyunca duyulmadı, ta ki Tisiphone II ve onun delirmiş takipçileri, diğer bir Rotacı Hanesi'ne karşı gizli bir savaş başlatana kadar. Bu vahşi muharebeler gerçekuzaydan kimse şahit olamadan, öteboyutun içinde gerçekleştirildi.
